query:
SELECT t.id, t.codigo, COUNT(DISTINCT f.id) as numFormandos, COUNT(DISTINCT e.id) as numEventos
FROM turmas t 
JOIN formandos f ON f.turmaId = t.id 
JOIN eventos e ON e.turmaId = t.id AND e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY t.id, t.codigo 
HAVING COUNT(f.id) > 0 AND COUNT(e.id) > 0
LIMIT 5

FROM turmas t 
JOIN formandos f ON f.turmaId = t.id 
JOIN eventos e ON e.turmaId = t.id AND e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY t.id, t.codigo 
HAVING COUNT(f.id) > 0 AND COUNT(e.id) > 0
LIMIT 5
